author: ggregory
msg: Use 2.9.1 instead of 2.10; 2.10 seems to scan the 'target' dir and wants license headers in .properties to be the header for Java files.

msg: HBASE-8248 HConnectionManager moved region tracking can cause the region server to redirect to itself; load balancer uses incorrect servername compare

msg: STANBOL-1018: using relative path and artifact-name depended location of css

author: hossman
msg: SOLR-4672: Requests attempting to use SolrCores which had init failures now result in 500 error responses with the details about the init failure, instead of 404 error responses (merge r1465749)
